title: Donald Trump’s Revenge (Ep 1833)
description:
In this episode, I address the new revelations, from a left-wing media outlet, that the case against Trump is totally collapsing. 

News Picks:

Newsweek admits the obvious about the Mar a Lago raid.


Old case over audio tapes in Bill Clinton's sock drawer could impact Mar-a-Lago search dispute.

Soros-Backed Group Plans to Entrench Critical Race Theory in Federal Govt.


Another ministry of truth? 


TikTok outlines plans to censor “conspiracy theories” and election “falsehoods.”


Fact Checker Spins Dr. Birx's Damning COVID Vaccine Admission.


Alex Wagner's primetime MSNBC show goes off the rails when her teleprompter malfunctions minutes into her first night.
